mapper.select: SELECT stp.factor_point factorPoint, stp.sample_task_id sampleTaskId, GROUP_CONCAT( su.emp_name ) sampleUsers, GROUP_CONCAT( stp.sample_user_id) sampleUserIds FROM t_sample_task_point stp LEFT JOIN t_sys_user su ON stp.sample_user_id = su.user_id WHERE stp.sample_task_id = #{sampTaskId} AND stp.factor_point = #{factorPoint} GROUP BY sampleTaskId, factorPoint
SELECT count( sti.job_id ) cnt FROM t_sample_task sti WHERE sti.organ_id = #{organId} AND sti.task_status = 0
SELECT sti.id, sti.task_status taskStatus FROM t_sample_task sti WHERE sti.organ_id = #{organId} AND DATE_FORMAT( sti.create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m' );
SELECT sti.id, sti.task_status taskStatus FROM t_sample_task sti WHERE sti.organ_id = 'wdcs1' AND YEAR ( sti.create_time ) = YEAR ( NOW() );
